name: virus.exewin32.syskill
description:
You are a IT in 90's and have to deal with Virus on your PC.

*GAME REQUIRES SOME KNOWLEDGE ON CMD*

Useful commands:
help
cd
dir
format
copy

cls - use this when there is too much on screen or you scrolled into limbo.

To run program type its name (check with dir) f.e: note21.txt
